Posts.Content: Oct 19, 2015 01:32PM AdrianneNix wrote: I could have written this post myself. My Mom was just diagnosed last week with stage 3 ILC and I'm losing it. She's my best friend and the caregiver for my children. We're still going through testing and preparing for chemo. When did you start to not feel so panick-y?
Posts.Title: Helping my mum Sophiec Sophiec
